channel.title: Observations on Blog Isaac Verminck
channel.description: Recent content in Observations on Blog Isaac Verminck

item.description: Борис самый большой молодец всех времен. +++++ Boris is the biggest little boy of all times. +++++ самый большой = most big = biggest молодец < молодой which means young. ец is a suffix appended to adjectives to create a masculine noun denoting a person having the adjective’s quality. So in this case a man who is young is a boy. The more conventional word for boy is мальчик which is interesting as well because it’s a combination of малый +‎ -чик.
